text: Chagrin Falls is a village in Cuyahoga County, Ohio, United States. It is a suburb of Cleveland. The village was created and has grown around a natural waterfall on the Chagrin River. As of the 2020 census, the village population was 4,188. The village was made in 1844 from parts of three townships in two counties. ==References== ==Other websites== *Village of Chagrin Falls official website Category:Villages in Ohio
title: Chagrin Falls, Ohio
